title: andi nEramnadik-karaiyOram
sahitya:
andi nEram nadik-karaiyOram vandu AravAram sheyyAdE sOram azhaguDan iLamayil iragonrADa nanrAga ninrADa


anupallavi

  andhamAga kuzhalUdum bAlA aravamuDi Erum rAjagOpAlA antarangamuDan 
gOpi nAn enrAlO avasarat-tAli kaTTum rAdhai maNanvALA


caraNam 1    aramporuL enbavai Agamam Anavai avai ivai enbadu nI nO ma dha nI 
yArum oru tuNai enbadariya oru vaghai Ala varuvadum nI nI ma dha nI
shurudi muDi mIdu karudi naTamADum tUyavan nI tONum kadir maraiyum
Aghum muzhu matiyum pOdumunam angE pOghavENumE
    caraNam 2    kuDattil koNarnda veNNai tinrAccu koLLai koNDa manamO unadAccu 
iDam valamAi vandu idenna vambAccu ennODini irukkaTTum ini engum kATTAdE mUccu
    caraNam 3    pinnalai pinninru izhukkalAmO adai pEccilE kETTAl maruppaLikkalAmO 
unnazhagu vizhi ennai En izhandadenru okkArum mikkArum uddhAram sheyyalAmO
    caraNam 4    attai vITTu vazhi kETTAi attanaiyum shonnEn Attam karai vazhi kETTAi attanaiyum shonnEn 
muttattukku vazhi kETTAl nAn enna sheivEn mOham taru pEccu ellAm vENDAmini shonnEn
